ticket.title: RFC-0032 Phase 4: implement PublishWorkLoopProfile (CAS + evidence anchor) + active-profile selection projection

in_scope: Add PublishWorkLoopProfile request to runtime proto and implement handler
Enforce bounded decode (<= 64KiB), deny_unknown_fields, and reject empty dedupe_key
Store canonical JSON to CAS and anchor via `evidence.published` category WORK_LOOP_PROFILE with deterministic evidence_id (WLP- prefix)
Add projection that selects the latest anchored profile per work_id as active (by ledger seq_id/timestamp)

steps: Extend runtime proto and implement handler: validate, CAS store, ledger append, idempotency on (work_id,dedupe_key)
Extend projection worker to maintain work_active_loop_profile(work_id -> profile_hash, evidence_id, updated_at_ns)
Add tests: idempotent publish; latest profile wins; empty dedupe_key rejected

criteria: Loop profile publication is idempotent and replayable from ledger+CAS.
Active profile selection is deterministic and projection-derived (no hidden state).
